snippet.title: Mario & Luigi: Brothership – Overview Trailer – Nintendo Switch
snippet.description:
Mario & Luigi: Brothership is available now! Learn more: https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/mario-and-luigi-brothership-switch/?utm_source=SW-AA&utm_medium=soytnoa&utm_campaign=N1138-01&utm_id=N1138-01

It’s all hands on deck for a nautical journey full of twists and turns! Learn all about the fractured world of Concordia, the quirky friends and foes you’ll meet, island exploration, bombastic battles, and more! Set sail in the Mario & Luigi: Brothership game, launching exclusively on the Nintendo Switch system November 7, 2024. Pre-orders are available now on Nintendo eShop.

Paid Nintendo Switch Online members* can buy a pair of Nintendo Switch Game Vouchers** for just $99.98 USD. Redeem each one for a digital game in the game voucher catalog to score savings, including pre-orders! Click here for more information: https://www.nintendo.com/store/products/nintendo-switch-game-vouchers/

*Any Nintendo Switch Online membership (sold separately) and Nintendo Account required for online features. Membership auto-renews after initial term at the then-current price unless canceled. Not available in all countries. Internet access required for online features. Terms apply. nintendo.com/switch-online

**Paid Nintendo Switch Online membership required at the time of purchase and redemption of Nintendo Switch Game Vouchers. Nintendo Switch Game Vouchers must be redeemed within 12 months from purchase date, have no cash value, and cannot be transferred, returned, or redeemed for cash. Each Nintendo Switch Game Voucher may be redeemed for one game offered as part of the catalog. To receive promotional value, Nintendo Switch Game Vouchers must be redeemed for two games with a cumulative price that is higher than the purchase price of the Nintendo Switch Game Vouchers. To pre-order a game using a Nintendo Switch Game Voucher, the Nintendo Switch Game Voucher must not expire prior to the game’s launch date. Nintendo Switch Game Vouchers may not be combined with any other sale, discount, or promotional offer unless otherwise specified. Game catalog subject to change.

#MarioLuigi #NintendoSwitch

Visit Nintendo.com for more info: https://www.nintendo.com/us/

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun: https://goo.gl/HYYsot

Follow Nintendo of America
X/Twitter: https://twitter.com/NintendoAmerica
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/NintendoAmerica
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/nintendoamerica
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/nintendo
